name: checklist_app
description: API de checklist com Node.js + TypeScript + PostgreSQL

scripts.stop: docker compose --env-file .env.dev down && kill $(cat .vite.pid 2>/dev/null) 2>/dev/null || echo 'Vite não está rodando'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:all: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
